MY VIDEO CLIPS!

So for some reason I haven't posted this yet, even though it's from weeks ago, maybe it's because I didn't win and I subconsciously (someone spell that for me) blanked it out... yes that sounds right!

Anyway I may not have won but my darling wife (yes we are actually married now by the way) Cat, won Young Handler, Veteran and was Reserve Champion Handler at her first ever show wearing my jacket which doesn't fit me at all, so she can keep the beast! So hurrah for her I guess :P

Full results and Photos are here

But here are my faves...!

Me and Frankie

Yes she CLEARED this! Unfortunately it scared us so much we got disqualified at the next fence, oops :P

Tiny but nice pic

It was VERY hot that day thus the donkeyness..

And here's my darling Catherinee

Enjoy :P

p.s What the fuck does a winking cat have to do with being in a crazy mood?

Attention all British Horse People...

http://www.livejournal.com/community/british_horses/

New community for British Horse Owners, I know I've been waiting for one for a long time, so spread the word and try to make it a decent one!

Well I took Joggy to our first show together, he's a dartmoor, very lazy, and likes to bronc if anyone comes behind him, so you can imagine the go round is very eventful!

Anyway we WON our class (Bob Templeton Ridden Mountain and Moorland) and qualified for the National Pony Society Championships, so here are some pictures :D

Hope you like :)

PURITY: 59% sex, 20% substance, 50% moral [47% total]
Well done! The higher your scores, the more "pure" you are. The lower, the more you've experienced.

This test was about done deeds, so your numbers will never climb. [It's interesting to think they all started at 100%.] But will your purity continue to fall? Will you OUTGROW or will you OUTDO your past experiences? It's up to you.


Advisory:
  • Don't date anyone if your moral purities differ by more than 30%.
  • Don't run a business with anyone if your substance purities differ by more than 40%.
  • Do be friends with someone who has less than 1/2 your sex purity. You'll enjoy their colorful company.


Note: as for the "TOTAL" purity value - that's a weighted combination of your scores, indicating what a typical purity test might say about you.



My test tracked 4 variables How you compared to other people your age and gender:
You scored higher than 3% on substance
 You scored higher than 29% on sex
 You scored higher than 12% on moral
 You scored higher than 11% on TOTAL
Link: The 3-Variable Purity Test written by chriscoyne on Ok Cupid

What are you? (10 different outcomes)
brought to you by Quizilla
You're like me! The intelligent loner. You're shy
at times but friendly, and you are never weak
and always independent. You are incredibly
intelligent (wise beyond your years) and have a
talent for many things (sports, music, art).
You have a kind and warm personality and enjoy
the simple things. Like hanging out with
friends and watching movies at home. But you're
sometimes quiet nature makes you a bit of an
outcast and a mystery to people. No matter how
pretty you are or smart or athletic, you just
can't seem to break into the crowd and be
noticed. Don't worry, try to be more outgoing
and speak out when you have more to say. Don't
hide behind your books and sports and computer,
get out there and get noticed. You also have
deep desires in life and feel vunerable and
alone at times. Don't feel sad either, What
helps me to express feelings and dreams that I
can't say to people, is through my writting.
Maybe you should try.

Your power is: Being a controller of an
element


Explanation: Wether it is earth, fire,
air or water or even all of them, you can
control that element. That means you can
manipulate their pysichal form and with just
thoughts and make an inferno for example. In
good purposes it can be used to protect but in
evil purposes it is used to hurt.
As a person you are slightly 'odd'. People see
you as different and probably has prejudices
against you. They see you as 'weird' or the
'freak', and either that hurts really much or
you chose to ignore it. You keep your hatred
for people inside and probably daydream about
killing them, which gives you satisfaction.
Truth is you are not evil, only missunderstood
and mistreated.
Negative aspects: Since you have deep
problems inside you could get into some sort of
mental illness or simply get depressed (if you
aren't already).

What Do You Need in Your Life? [dark pics]
brought to you by Quizilla
Your element is Wind. You are the guy/girl that is
unpredictable. No one knows what you're going
to do next and what you're in the mood for.
Studying is not your thing and you would rather
go to a party than stay home. Life is just for
fun and you need to be free to live according
to you. You waste no time on lies, if you feel
or think one thing you say it even if it hurts.
Of course, people may be quite upset but that
doesn't really bother you. Its not that you
don't care, because you do, but in these
situations it's a waste of time. You live up in
the clouds and are quite a dreamer about life.
People often consider you beautiful, but harsh
and they would think twice before getting to
know you. But once they do, they'll learn that
you are always willing to take yourself and
your friends on adventures. Never will it be a
boring time with you and your friends
appreciate that. You are not often seen sad,
but you have your times. If someone has been
mean to you, you can quite easily trash-talk
them for betraying you. Nevertheless, you are
most of the time a good spirit who just want to
have some fun. Rate and message!

What is your element? [with pics + 7 outcomes + detailed answeres!]

You're a very mellow, care-free person. Your
exactly what calm, cool, and collected mean.
You never overreact or panic in a bad situation
and you always know what to do. Everyone goes
to you for advice because you never lose your
head so your very reliable. You tend to take
everything in stride, like in school your moto
is just sit back and relax not to say you dont
pay attention and work, but you dont overexert
yourself. Even though people come to you for
counciling(sp?) you can still be very quite,
your not good with making new friends, but your
extremely close to the ones you have. Remember
its ok to put your emotions out there even
though there is a chance they might get hurt.
Also in school sometimes its good to stress out
a little, just because you think you dont need
to study doesnt mean you should'nt, and also
try to push yourself more even though you might
be good where you are doesnt mean you can,t be
better. Check out my new short story.

i have so much tosay but not enough patience to say it all.

quickquick summary - posies been sold, frankie and polly are at stud and heidi bought me a chihauhau which has broken its leg and is at the vets now. oh yeah - and heidis got a new cuntface of a boyfriend.

he doesnt do owt bad he isnt mean or tells me or off anything but i just hate his fucking guts. its just him, nothing he does, its just fucking HIM! he's so uncultured and course and common and it DISGUSTS ME - and hes a fucking homophobe - he really deserves to die soon.

its so hard to explain why he gets to me so much, its tiny little things all the fucking time that no one else wud understand but i want to kill him and everyone else - im just getting these huge huge rage fits, like i did when was like 14/15 and suicidal and just i feel like i'm going psychotic, like over the edge, i can sit in a room on my own and cant get any peace or quiet it seems so loud in my head, its like, i feel so lonely, but i can't get any peace - its like my brain is spinning round and round and my bodies being torn in all directions and the only way to stop that is taking pills, prescription stuff, but i'm not allowed them so when I find them I can't help but take load sof them, im not attention seaking or ussulkign like my mum thinks, im doing it so im a nicer person and i dont shout at everyone - cant she see how unhappy i am? what do i have to do string her fucking dog up to the washing line and pull its guts out till she notices?

but noooooooooooooooooooo she wont careeeeeeeeee shes nice and happy with her cuntfeature boyfriend why would what little old i think matter

she takes him everywhere, instead of me.

its like, now she has him, im not needed anymore, its like having a best friend whos gone on holiday so u get a new bestfriend but as soon as the old bestfriend is back u dont give too shits about the new bestfriend no molre.

i rthink even menace the jackrussel feels the same, i keep finding him under my feet on the computer or in my bed (sofa) in the morning, when usually he's always in heidis room - but now shes got lover boy she dont need any of us.

course the childtren dont seem to mind, dickshit takes oban out to the workshop to play with cars and teaches the other ones fighting moves (?!)

i feel like ive got so much more to say but i cant sya it

its like theres so much running round in my mind i cant blank it and its sending me crazy and i just want to hurt sometihng

Sorry haven't got round to writing in here for ages because I've like not been able to muster up the enthusiasm, see I should tell you I'm having all the tick off box characteristics of depression yet I have no reason to be depressed, so I've analysed and realised this;

(Hard to explain as well and I'm tired as fuck and it'll all come out wrong)

When I was at school, if I felt like everyone didn't love me and come to my beck and call and really care what I had to say I would get really down like properly not just sulking I would go into cutting and everything, just for not being absolute centre of attention absolutely all of the time. 
But then comes the twist I don't like being centre of attention all the time, I like people to be my groupies, yet me not have to work for it and not be interesting all the time so really I felt like people should love me and worship me constantly and show it constantly and if they didn't it all brainwashed me and escalated in my brain to the world hating me and not caring about me etc - Really really sad when you write it down like that but that's exactly how I work. So I overdosed and left, hah.

Anyway the problem seems to be now that my mum has a new boyfriend, and yeah he's alright and she's really happy etc but it's like - now Heidi doesn't give all her attention to me (This is why I hate Oban so much because I always think she's paying him more attention and I make her life hell for it and I know I do but I can't help it, that's just how I work, everything just blows up in my mind and I don't know maybe I'm just slightly crazy). 
Yeah so it's like now all of a sudden just because I'm not the absolute goddess all the time in my family, I have huge rage fits, absolute apathy and lack of goals in everything, especially horses which is like AREYOUSMOKINSOMETHINGMATE! And most strange of all I'm getting like realllllly huge urges to go and take some pills, not to overdose, but to get off my face and float around like I used to do at school. But I can't find them for shit and I don't get ANY time alone it's like - I can't even find a room to wank in anymore - that sort of situation. The children are everywhere and they always have their friends round and this fucking stalker boy who works for my mums boyfriend like stays here from morning till midnight pestering the fuck out of me and he doesn't understand what the fuck Asexual means, no fucker seems to now adays, I fucking hate men.

See rage fits, gotta calm downnnn.

But WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH ME why do I have this fucking unrealistic urge to be here there and everywhere and when I'm not I want to die, what the fuck IS THAT, I belong in the fucking O.C I tell you... it sounds that way don't it, fucking wank shafting arses, ARG.

You have an angry soul! Angry Souls arent always
angry, but they cannot easily forgive and hold
grudges. You probably often get in fights with
your friends and family, and its difficult for
you to understand. When someone makes a
mistake, you dont let go easily and hold on to
those memories. Your very stubborn and your
rage is known to everyone. Though you never
actually mean it, you can say mean things in a
fight and go over board. Many people are
sometimes intimidated by your anger. But you
have many redeeming qualities and those are
that you are quite intelligent and smart. You
would make a good businesswoman or lawyer
because you know how to prove your point. You
cherish the ones around you, and appreciate
life, even though you can complain or throw a
tantrum now and then. The good things is, you
keep your emotions very outspoken, and are
normally a very happy person because all your
rage is let on the outside. Anger is simply a
state, but you, yourself as a person, are
great.

I've just realised I am an elitist snob towards certain types of horse owners XD
Like the most amusing member on my friends list is an elitist snob towards certain types of Nirvana fans. (Here here kill the Cobainites!)

Ok I knew I didn't much like other horsey people before but I realised why I have respect for some and the others I just laugh at even if I am friends with you, I do no doubt laugh at you when your not looking :) And don't go asking me if you're one of them, you probably are, it's nothing personal, I'm just a stuck up bitch.

There are many many reasons why I do or don't laugh at you, I'll try and think of some... There all very vague sweeping claims which will hopefully piss all of you off, but hey, don't complain this is my journal.

  • If you're from a non horsey family, I don't think, aww poor you, I think, hah townie cunts.
  • If you have a horsey family I think you have more commitment, if you don't I think your wannabes and laugh.
  • If your not from a horsey family but have a horsey job and your OWN horse I like you.
  • If you are on a livery yard, I laugh.
  • If you WORK at a livery yard and act like the horses there are your OWN I fucking despise you.
  • If you live in a town, I laugh.
  • If you ride your horse once/twice a week - Youre not commited you suck. Hah
  • I hate happy hackers.
  • I hate people who use horses like machines.
  • I hate people who can only get their pony on the bit, put it on a stranger and they have no idea.
  • Man I can't even think I'm being distracted by loads of shit and I hate so much shit - I just hate wannabes who are shit as fuck and don't even know it!

But yeah, in conclusion, if you aren't me, you suck.

On a lighter note, if you fantasize about yourself, is that incest? Not that I do, but it's a good question.

Honestly if anyone can find pictures of her, send me send me... so I can torture it!

Well my lifes been pretty mundane, in the sense I haven't had the urge to kill myself nor others. Which I suppose is nice.
But I've been fucking ill - Like it started off the exact moment I'd been away from the ponies for three days come back groom dustydusty Frankie - So I first thought my sneezing and sniveling was dust alergy, then it got most sinister so I thought.. Humm hayfever? Then it took to killing me so I couldn't stand up without falling down and felt all feverish. So obviously killer cold (not quite flu).
Buttt my Grannies been pumping me full of hippy shit which has REALLY helped and so I've been through all these stages in just a week and am almost clearing up. My sinuses are ok but I still feel a bit dodgy on me feet :P Which means I won't totally die at the Hunter Trial on Sunday...

Anyway yeah, so because I'm a masochist I decided to ride Frankie yesterday while I was easily at the worst stage of my killer cold and got pics woo!

OOOooookkkkkk I shall try and remember bits of last night to amuse you but I'm really tired so it's not gonna be very interesting :P

Eermmm not a lot to be said really, food was ok-ish, music was shit - Currently overdosing my self with Nirvana to wash away memories of Girls A-fucking-Loud et cetera! People were ace. My friends kept trying to either set me up or get me into fights. How much do I love them...?
Spent most of the night rounding up the lesbians (there were none) but I found lots of pretend ones HURRAH :-P Spent the next most of the night convincing people not to fucking set me up with any boys because I don't like boys - Fuckers LOL! Slowly convincing people but nahh they still think I'm joking - Ahh well Fairymuff.
Spent a LOT of the night sicking my fucking guts up - Was horrrrriblay! And seriously I was sat in the cubicle for at least half an hour or an hour kinda sleeping and making sure I wasn't gonna be sick again - And NO ONE came to look for me - How shitty is that? Not even my lover of all time KJ! Anyway I got out of my cubicle to find Christina crying so I was like comforting her while being all drunk but it seemed to work so hurrah me!
Then the rest of the night was just me realllllly wanting to sleep - the night went so slow and I was SO tired (fucking lightweight) and then I was SO fucking cold and yeah but I was still happy :P I dunno theres loads of other shit I'm missing out but yeah.

Lol right went down the to the stables this morning and which little fucker did we greet standing on the verge where the yard joins the main road (!!) ?
 JAMIE!!  Poor little thing he looked like a proper wild welsh boy who should be in the mountains somewhere XP !
So cute though, we parked the car up and I didn't want to go running over to catch him incase he fucked off down the road so I was like "Jamieeeefishh come heree" And he diddd AWW - I think he was quite scared and lost really seemed rather eager to see me, deffinately a first :-P So yah turns out Pie had chased him out of their stable round the back and Jamie can jump o.O !

So that excitement over I then had the fun of doping Pie. Hah, Hah, Hah. Fucking maniac. Was actually pretty easy, just sort of had a few people anchoring his head down while I squirted dopey paste shit in his mouth as fast as I could. He didn't mind too much, caramel flavoured - UmUmmyummyscrummy. So then we tidied him up ya know, cut a bottom layer out of his mane cos we're lazy and he's hairy, pulled the rest, pulled out half his forelock cos it was down to his friggin nose, chopped off all face whiskers, really chopped off a lot of beard growth all around his face and neck etc, chopped off half his tail shaved the other half off (ya know what I meannn) and now he looks like a SHP again not a wicked welsh boy!

Hurrah!

Guesss whatttt? I had a little premonition today :-o !! LOL
Here's the story;

Today we were traveling to the stables but first we were going to go to the Tack Shop and pick up a hacking jacket for Aaron. Anyway on the way I smelled something burning, probably from outside. And it set me on this really strange train of thought which started off the ponies being stuck inside their boxes while the barn was on fire, but this then honed onto Frankie (no more fire anymore) being all strung up and trapped and suffocating because there was rope round her neck etc. Anyway I had one can only be described as a mini seizure, pure dread, like when you've been smoking pot and you get reallllly fucking badly paranoid and it feels like your muscles are spazzaming and your bodies gone rigid and you can't move? I'm sure that happens to other people. Anyway that happened to me while in the car so I threw a little fit and made mother go to the ponies first.

And as soon as we got to the barn I went over to see Frankie and guess what, she had both her feet through her haynet just sort of.. Dangling around standing on her back legs, and the poor thing was all sweated up and whinnying. Luckily she isn't thick enough to make a real big fuss about it but she was dancing about and I was panicking because I could see her little legs snapping, big phobia of mine always has been, pony getting legs caught in stuff.

So anyway I cut the bastard bailer twine that didn't fucking snap and massaged Frankies legs better, they were pretty warm and slightly swolen but no rope burns or lasting damage, thank fuck!

I didn't realise till I was feeding her that I'd seen an extreme case of what had happened earlier on and then I thought - Duuuudeee LOL

See Frankie loves me, she speaks to me in my head.. Hah I'm so fucking gonna start telling people I hear my horses voice in my head. Oh yesssss.

*sighh* bla bla bla manermaner doobdoobidooby

Hahaha prepare for the rantings of a maniac.

I'm pretty sure I might die soon. Soon being next 5 years but that's very soon on the outlook of things.

I'm starting to wind down like old people do. It's freaky.

I'm not too bothered about it, I just hope it isn't too drawn out ya know? If it is it'll be out with the shot gun and a nice little note saying it's the kindest way. They'll understand, I would if it were someone else. What's it called euthanasia (but spelt right) that's the one - it's legit.

I keep getting all this weird misplaced guilt for stupid shit I never usually care about (like bombings and war and homeless and retards etc :P) I think like I'm subconsciously cleaning my act up so I go to a nice place when I die.
